Handles user controlpackets such as writes to the database. More...

Detailed Description

Handles user controlpackets such as writes to the database.

Creates an MapReader according to the specifications.

Parameters:
jobQueue The queue where to insert the request to be processed by the processor.
sendQueue The queue for sending packets
loadedMaps Where to look for the currently loaded maps.
packetReaderThread 
port 
definedRank Value used when voting for leader. High value indicated that the system administrator want this Module to be leader.

Definition at line 90 of file UserReader.h.

bool UserReader::leaderProcessCtrlPacket (  Packet *  p  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Take care of some of the special controllpackets that might be received by the UserModule-leader.

Calls the leaderProcessCtrlPacket in the super class to take care of the ``ordinary'' control packet.

Parameters:
p The incomming control packet.
Returns:
True if the packet was handled by this method or by the method in the superclass, false otherwise.

Reimplemented from StandardReader.

Called by reader periodically, overriden to make checks from time to time.

Sends a periodic request to this module.

virtual void UserReader::sendRequestPacket (  RequestPacket *  request  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Send a request packet to the best module.

This might be this module. The packet is either deleted or put in a queue.

Parameters:
request The packet to send.

Reimplemented from StandardReader.
